title: 87-89 Cushing Road
posting_body: Located at 87-89 Cushing Road in Cohasset, MA, the existing property has 4 apartments available, for eligible applicants.
There 3 two bedrooms apartments available, 2 units are available for immediate occupancy.
Each unit includes one full bath in approximately 800 sq.
ft. of living space.
This is a smoke free building.
Pets are not allowed.
There is a coin-op laundry in the building.
Surface parking is available at no charge.
This property is walking distance to downtown and the waterfront.
The monthly rents is: $2,200 for a two-bedroom unit.
Water and sewer are included in the rent.
Tenants are responsible for electricity, gas heat and hot water.
A utility allowance has been deducted from the maximum allowable rent.
These affordable units will be distributed on a first come first serve basis.
Income eligibility requirements.
The rents are NOT subsidized, or income based.
You are responsible for the full rent.
Section 8 or a Housing voucher will be accepted but it is your responsibility to find out if your Section 8 or Housing provider accepts the rent and project.
The minimum incomes, without a Section 8 or Housing Voucher, are:  Two Bedroom - $66,000.
Visit our website for an application: <URL>
